title: SparkyLinux 2023.07 Rolling Brings Debian 13 Trixie’s Packages, Secure Boot, and More
description:
SparkyLinux 2023.07 rolling distribution is now available for download with packages from the Debian 13 "Trixie" repositories, Secure Boot enabled by default, and many other changes.

The post SparkyLinux 2023.07 Rolling Brings Debian 13 Trixie’s Packages, Secure Boot, and More appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: Slackware Linux Turns 30, Happy Birthday!
description:
Slackware Linux, one of the world's oldest surviving Linux distributions, has just turned 30 and it's still active. Happy birthday!

The post Slackware Linux Turns 30, Happy Birthday! appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
